attributes.title: President
attributes.review: Can I start off with saying this is the worst most racist president to exist. He’s so sexist and racist and harms everyone that gets in his way. We need him out of this world!

attributes.title: APP SECRETLY DOWNLOADS A VIRUS 🦠
attributes.review: The app took 20 hours to download and secretly downloads a virus 🤭😱 NOW MY PHONE HAS A VIRUS AND IT IS SENDING ME TEXT MESSAGES TO A SCARY PERSON!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I am appalled that the app store would allow this trojan horse of an app to continue on their platform!

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app is bod bad and boring. Waste of a app it should be deleted. This is so horrible. It’s just silly Most trash app ever. So many glitches so boring.

THE AFTERMATH — When a night in the woods goes horribly awry, Betty, Archie and Veronica are forced to confront what one of them may be capable of. MURDER IN A SMALL TOWN — Alice begins shooting a documentary about Riverdale and the latest mystery involving one of its own.

attributes.title: Don’t download!!!!!
attributes.review: Terrible app- made my phone glitch and bugged it like crazy! Going to have to get a new phone now. Thanks for nothing trump 2020 app!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EXPERIENCE EVER!!!
attributes.review: I don’t know who designed this app but they did a poor job. What hateful content! The news portion is wildly biased and false. Anywho I really hope someone is held responsible for this.

attributes.title: Disappointed 🤢🤮
attributes.review: I had very high expectations for this app and it was just honestly a huge let down🙄🙄

attributes.title: DISAPPOINTING!!🤮
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes of getting notifications about politics and current events... BUT IT WAS A SCAM!! i wasted my space and time downloading this😔 it insulted me and told me to vote for a cheeto man🤮🤮

attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED
attributes.review: I hated seeing a Cheeto man pop up on the first picture when I opened it I was not only scared for my life but I was scared for my safety do not recommend

attributes.title: Hate this
attributes.review: I just wanted McDonald’s from DoorDash but nooo this app is horable for gettig food the person who runs this is a horable person 😤😤so mad 😡 it also gave my phone a virus 🦠
